turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, can I get a tall vanilla latte with almond milk from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure. what starbucks should i place the order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: the one on Route 40 in Columbia, Maryland.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want your drink iced or hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. the order u gave me is for 1 hot tall vanilla latte with almond milk from the starbucks on route 40 in columbia, maryland.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like me to submit the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok i've placed the order, it'll be ready for pick up in 15 mins.
